name: Grass Master
description: Count on us for great green grass. Hundreds of satisfied customers!

experience.workDescription: Worked out a plan, implemented the solution.
Customer had a unique issue, after some deliberation we figured out and implemented a solution.

reviews.reviewText: Everyone knows that debugging is twice as hard as writing a program in the first place. So if you're as clever as you can be when you write it, how will you ever debug it?
Some of the best programming is done on paper, really. Putting it into the computer is just a minor detail.
When you don't create things, you become defined by your tastes rather than ability. Your tastes only narrow & exclude people. So create.
